prompt: Minimalist logo design: stylized Medusa head wearing a construction hard hat. The Medusa has sleek geometric snake hair with subtle circuit board patterns. Colors: deep navy blue (#1e3a5f) face, bright safety orange (#f97316) hard hat, electric blue (#3b82f6) glowing eyes and snake accents. Clean vector style, suitable for favicon. White or transparent background. Professional tech company logo aesthetic, no text.
